Two bots combined shouldn't form a 45 foot tall gestalt, what were 
you thinking? While I'm at it, LN, can you please send the council 
explainations for all of your weapons on your bots. We discussed 
your ships, but your bots may be pushing our power limits. 

Also, can you please try to keep your posts reasonable, words like 
"massive" (and especially when combined with "powerful") make 
your bots sound generally much more powerful than the other bots. 
You may not think so but you aren't the one reading the post and 
the one making the decision of how to respond. 

Your post with Gemini Dragon where he kicked Train Wreck was a 
mode, you posted for the kick hitting (which is illegal). You've got 
to make an attempt when you attack.

Orchid (and btw no need yell MODE k? =) was right in the sense 
that all of the bots coming and helping the Chivitrons was cheap, 
but it is incorrect to say that the Chivitrons themselves are cheap, 
that would be a false stereotype of the group as a whole. The 
Chivitrons are made up of many bots, not just one cheap one. =P


On 15 Jul 2001, at 2:00, Legendarynemasis@... wrote:

> Gestalts are allowed to be much bigger, Yan said 50 feet was the
> maximum and Gemini Dragon is 45 feet tall. its Gemini 1 and 2
> combined.
